head.title: CDK News - Supplementing Material
head.summary: Webpage with supplementing material to CDK News articles.

webpage.para: This page contains supplementing material to CDK News articles.

listitem.para: R. Guha, Using thr CDK as a backend to R, CDK News, 2.1
cdkfp.R - source code for the fingerprint function
fpdata.tgz - MOL & HIN files (first 59 taken from Avery et al., J.Med. Chem., 2002, 45, 292-303 and the remainder from Goll et al., J. Chem.Inf. Conmput.Sci., 1999, 39, 974-983.

para.ulink: Binary fingerprint tools package for R

listitem.para: cdklm.R - source code for the the descriptor calculation function

lmdata.tgz - HIN formatted structures for the regression model example described in the article. The tarball also contains the file called depv.txt which lists the boiling point values for the 277 molecules. (taken from Goll et al., J. Chem.Inf. Conmput.Sci., 1999, 39, 974-983).
